item.description: Hï»¿urricane Melissa has made landfall in Jamaica as a Category 5 storm, with "catastrophic" damage expected.

item.title: Landmark puberty block ban reinstated by Queensland government
item.description: <p>Relief over a landmark court win has been short-lived for a transgender teenager&#x27;s mother after an Australian-first puberty blocker ban was reinstated.</p>

item.title: Australian National Weather Forecast
item.description: National weather forecast for Australia including capital city temperatures, rain radar maps, satellite images, synoptic chart, and weather warnings
